quote: When I left Palmeiras, it was sad but happy as well, with a title.
author: Gabriel Jesus

quote: I work extremely hard to stay positive and happy. But I get sad and anxious, too, just like everyone.
author: Rachel Platten

quote: I was a little boy singing sad songs, about 9 or 10 years old in the woods. I listened to my voice coming back to me. It was as high as you could go. I dreamed of being famous as a singer when I was on those cotton fields. I wanted to see the world and meet people.
author: Percy Sledge

quote: I like to write from a slightly sad or complicated place. But with a sense of hope and happiness at the same time.
author: Eliot Sumner

quote: We're not whole people if we're just one emotion. On any given day, you can be happy, sad, angry, and so on... As you mature, you just learn to deal with each one of those emotions.
author: Phyllis Smith

quote: It's too easy to say that orange is happy and black is sad. To me, black is perfect. You can fill it with the emotion you want to express.
author: Ann Demeulemeester

quote: There must be something solemn, serious, and tender about any attitude which we denominate religious. If glad, it must not grin or snicker; if sad, it must not scream or curse.
author: William James

quote: When I did the film Generations, in which the character died, I felt like a guest for the first time. That made me very sad.
author: William Shatner

quote: I had an inkling that I was going to prison before I actually did, because I'd witnessed my father and my elders going through it. It seemed like that's the way that you got respect, which is a sad thing.
author: Ashley Walters

quote: I'm sad to report that in the past few years, ever since uncertainty became our insistent 21st century companion, leadership has taken a great leap backwards to the familiar territory of command and control.
author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: You can have nothing and be sad, or you can have nothing and be, like, positive and look at it in a good way and try to make your circumstance better.
author: Slim Jimmy

quote: I didn't really want to live, so anything that was an investment in time made me angry... but also I just felt sad. When the hopelessness is hurting you, it's the fixtures and fittings that finish you off.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: I didn't know what to expect when we first started touring behind 'Southeastern' because you don't want to lull anybody to sleep or lose their attention. But it's really been incredible how the crowds seem to be just as excited for the slow, sad songs as they are for the old rockers.
author: Jason Isbell

quote: I tell people on Facebook what my Playstation user name is. It's quite a social thing. I put the headset on and I'm just yappin' away. It's kind of like a sad way of socialising. It's like meeting up with people but when you get bored with them you can just switch them off and walk away.
author: Limmy

quote: I think Jerry Lee is sad. As a musician, he was far more talented than Elvis Presley. Everybody down in Memphis knows that. Elvis became a movie star because he was beautiful. Not that Elvis wasn't talented, but Jerry Lee Lewis was incomprehensibly talented as a musician.
author: Alec Baldwin

quote: If I write a sad song, at the end it's gotta be like, 'Dude, things are looking up!'
author: Andy Grammer

quote: It's very rare that things are true about yourself that are on the Internet. It's just sad sometimes. So you definitely try and stay away from it as much as possible.
author: Taylor Lautner

quote: With 'Lost,' some members of the cast would literally open the script and find out that they were dead. I mean, that's quite sad, really.
author: Naveen Andrews

quote: There is something inexpressibly sad in the thought of the children who crossed the ocean with the Pilgrims and the fathers of Jamestown, New Amsterdam, and Boston, and the infancy of those born in the first years of colonial life in this strange new world.
author: Alice Morse Earle

quote: It's much easier to write when you're sad. But you can end up isolated and depressed because you almost need to put yourself in that situation to have that angst to write from.
author: Natalie Imbruglia

quote: It is so sad that it takes so long for people to understand what needs to happen in order to be free.
author: Faith Ringgold

quote: I was rejected for couple of adverts for sounding too sad. One was for Diet Coke, but it's a good thing it didn't happen because it probably would have been a big blight on my soul. It also happened with a fabric softener called Downy, and I guess the way I sang 'Only Downy' made people weep.
author: Patty Griffin

quote: I challenge the idea that films about rich people are escapism and films about working class people are dour and sad. I find the opposite's the case.
author: Ken Loach

quote: The sad truth is that without complex business partnerships between African elites and European traders and commercial agents, the slave trade to the New World would have been impossible, at least on the scale it occurred.
author: Henry Louis Gates

quote: I'm not a singer. In 'Bye Bye Birdie,' I think I was the sad girl who sits on the park bench during 'Put on a Happy Face.'
author: Yvonne Strahovski

quote: I am not sad, but I am melancholic. When you lose your mother at 20 and then your father soon after, melancholia is part of your life.
author: Patricia Kaas

quote: The world changes fast, and a lot of the old country folks have a hard time keeping up with it, and it makes them sad.
author: Jason Isbell

quote: The sad fact is that it would be fair to say that United is a generic, bureaucratic, tired company. A sort of DMV in the sky. No real culture. No real strategy. No real expectations for employees or customers. All of which is a shame.
author: Patrick Lencioni

quote: I'm not sad about any of my life. It's so unconventional. It doesn't look anything like I thought it would.
author: Edie Falco

quote: Well in the end the world can crank itself up to sanctions, as it has with Zimbabwe, another sad case.
author: Helen Clark

quote: I love writing sad songs.
author: Noah Cyrus

quote: Once I was checking to hotel and a couple saw my ring with Blues on it. They said, 'You play blues. That music is so sad.' I gave them tickets to the show, and they came up afterwards and said, 'You didn't play one sad song.'
author: Buddy Guy

quote: For me, it is sad when I listen to this, that one player must be more selfish to reach the top level.
author: Antonio Conte

quote: Death makes us sad, but it can also make us feel more alive.
author: Sally Mann

quote: If you want to come out of a sad moment, you have to work really hard.
author: Frank Rijkaard

quote: My favorite thing in the world is a quiz show, 'University Challenge,' so you can see what kind of sad person I am.
author: Lynne Truss

quote: I've found that people feel very free to say insulting things, not about me personally, but about the things I believe. It's sad, because I really could care less where people are coming from, politically, religiously.
author: Patricia Heaton

quote: I would love to be married. But it's not a necessity like the way that I feel I need and want to have children. It would be wonderful to have a husband, and I would feel blessed to do it. But I would feel sad for the rest of my life if I had no kids.
author: Mindy Kaling

quote: NASA's been one of the most successful public investments in motivating students to do well and achieve all they can achieve, and it's sad that we are turning the program in a direction where it will reduce the amount of motivation it provides to young people.
author: Buzz Aldrin

quote: I hooked up with director Jacques Audiard for this film called 'Rust & Bone' with Marion Cotillard. I loved that experience so much I'm truly sad that it's over!
author: Matthias Schoenaerts

quote: There's all this stuff that is happening in Edinburgh now, it's a sad attempt to create an Edinburgh society, similar to a London society, a highbrow literature celebrity society.
author: Irvine Welsh

quote: I have nothing against younger women and older men on screen. What is sad is that so many women over 40 who have so much to give aren't being considered to play opposite men their own age or younger.
author: Rene Russo

quote: A sad truth I learned as a DP starting out was that it doesn't matter how beautiful I make it if the story and performance are not there. That should be number one.
author: Reed Morano

quote: I used to sit near Marilyn Monroe in the Actor's Studio. She'd get dressed up because that was her identity. Sad. Those cameras wouldn't leave her alone. She didn't know where to hide.
author: Doris Roberts

quote: However, we might oppose it, abortion is a sad feature of modern life.
author: Robert Casey

quote: And it's sad because it's like a surprise to people - almost an anomaly - when artists are actually refined and trained on an instrument. That's the last thing people think about.
author: Vanessa Carlton

quote: It is sad when people can't connect, and the sense of desperation that you feel when there is nothing to look forward to.
author: David Frankel

quote: My father was an urchin that lived in Hell's Kitchen. He was part of a family of nine. I mean, there were times that were better and worse, but mostly, by the time we got to L.A., they'd lost whatever they had. And it was a sad time. And both he and I became truck drivers for different companies.
author: Frank Gehry

quote: There is still so much drama in my life, but I'm not a sad person anymore.
author: Nikki Reed

quote: I mean, I was just one of the ones who got exposed, and because of the position I was in, where I was in my life, it went mainstream. A lot of people got out of it after my situation, not because I went to prison but because it was sad for them to see me go through something that was so pointless, that could have been avoided.
author: Michael Vick

quote: About 15,000 years ago, humans colonised America, wiping out in the process about 75% of its large mammals. Numerous other species disappeared from Africa, from Eurasia, and from the myriad islands around their coasts. The archaeological record of country after country tells the same sad story.
author: Yuval Noah Harari

quote: Emotions fascinate me, just being able to express myself through acting. I love that. And I think, in everyday life, you're always trying to repress your emotions. Like if you're sad, you don't want to show it to someone else.
author: Jodie Comer

quote: I happen to be interested in watching a face age. I like faces of women aging so it makes me personally quite sad. That's a beautiful gift from God. If people don't want to see that anymore then I won't be in anymore movies.
author: Debra Winger

quote: Love Is Louder is a movement that is hopefully going to bring some awareness and make some noise when it comes to teens who are feeling suicidal or even just sad, outcasts, and being bullied, and really feel like they have nowhere to turn to.
author: Brittany Snow

quote: Doesn't matter if you're sad or happy. I can be sad, you can be happy; it's all good. That's all I'm saying - let's just be us.
author: Kyle

quote: I can be dramatic. I can be funny. I can be sexy. I can be sad. I can be glad.
author: Kimberly Elise

quote: You put a song on the record or on tape and you stop singing it. You just don't sit around and sing it anymore unless you're performing. That's kind of sad.
author: Rick Danko

quote: It was a long time in the making, my divorce. One day became less special than the next, and pretty soon, we ceased all conversation. It is a sad day when you have nothing left to say.
author: Ricki Lake

quote: Man Repeller is intended to chronicle all the fashion trends that women love and men hate. I started it because I am woman with a deep appreciation for harem pants. And sometimes blaming clothing on a sad love life is easier than blaming oneself!
author: Leandra Medine

quote: In the morning, I'm like the Antonioni movies. I'm little sad. I haven't the courage to start the day. In the evenings, I'm happier, more alive - like the character I play in 'An Almost Perfect Affair.'
author: Monica Vitti

quote: The only thing that can blow away the Michael Jordan sad face meme, is the Floyd Mayweather knockout meme. If Floyd Mayweather got knocked out - knocked out to the point where he is ice cold on the ground - I think that's the one meme that can just overwhelm the whole Jordan issue.
author: Jay Williams

quote: It is very sad for a man to make himself servant to a single thing; his manhood all taken out of him by the hydraulic pressure of excessive business.
author: Theodore Parker

quote: It would be a sad story to get rid of religious belief, national identity, family, and even sexual identity. That's not freedom.
author: Viktor Orban

quote: My favorite pieces that I've written, either for St. Lucia or for myself, have always had a transporting quality to them, where they take you out of the moment and somewhere positive that feels nostalgic and happy but sad at the same time.
author: St. Lucia

quote: As a child, I was subjected to a lot of spaghetti Westerns and hated them. I wanted the Indians to win - or just not be so sad!
author: Kara Walker

quote: Getting help for my issues was one of the hardest things I've ever done, because when I get dangerously sad or manic, those feelings seek to perpetuate themselves.
author: Chris Gethard

quote: I don't consider myself a celebrity. That would be kind of sad.
author: Adam Driver

quote: It's a sad commentary on our time - to use a phrase much favored by my late father - that people increasingly celebrate Christmas Day by going to the movies.
author: Michael Dirda

quote: Acting gave me the opportunity to do outrageous things. It allowed me to be sad, happy, angry and lustful, even if it was just vicariously.
author: Joan Allen

quote: I have read a thousand screenplays, and I have acted in a handful of them, and I have felt when it feels good, the writing, and it feels natural, and feels funny or sad or honest or whatever it may be. You connect. And I felt when it feels like writing, when it feels stale, or when it feels artificial or forced, or too theatrical or whatever.
author: Ryan Eggold

quote: You can play basketball and have a magic night and score 40 points with your team-mates and win the game. There are favourites for the World Cup, but you can't guarantee Germany, Spain, or Brazil will win, but here, everyone can guarantee that Mercedes or Ferrari will win the race, and this is very sad for the sport.
author: Fernando Alonso

quote: Certainly what happened to the dinosaurs was not good - that was a terrible day for the dinosaurs, very sad. But I have to say, there are a lot of threats we face as people and, as someone who lives in Los Angeles, I'm personally more likely to die from driving on the freeway than I am from an asteroid, so you have to put that risk in perspective.
author: Carrie Nugent

quote: The sad thing is, I never wanted to be Princess Leia - I always wanted to be Han Solo!
author: Katee Sackhoff

quote: I would never have become music director of the Chicago Symphony, which would have been an extremely sad loss.
author: Georg Solti

quote: In Mississippi, you don't admit that you're gay. It's just an awkward thing down South, which is sad.
author: Lance Bass

quote: I had all these tapes in my closet that I had shot years ago with my friend Jean-Michel Basquiat. I was working on a film about him when he died, and then I just put everything away. It was too sad.
author: Tamra Davis

quote: If I'm laughing, you know I'm either very happy or very sad. I cope with things with jokes.
author: Cristela Alonzo

quote: My favorite monster has always been the zombie. They are so much fun. They can be scary, pathetic, sad, funny, tragic, even heroic. They are the most elastic monster because, even with all of that, they don't interfere with telling stories about the humans. They serve as threats and metaphors, but they allow the story to be about people.
author: Jonathan Maberry

quote: I find everything in life a little bit sad, but I also find a great deal of hope everywhere I look.
author: David Lowery

quote: Unfortunately, we are living in an era where plenty of songs with vulgar, objectionable lyrics are also becoming popular. It's a disturbing trend, and I feel really sad when I see small kids dancing to such numbers in television shows. In my career so far, I have refused any song whose lyrics I haven't been comfortable with.
author: Shreya Ghoshal

quote: If you have a friend or family member with breast cancer, try not to look at her with 'sad eyes.' Treat her like you always did; just show a little extra love.
author: Hoda Kotb

quote: Even today, England is a very repressed, repressive country, and there's pressure to be kind of a certain way, so people do things that ultimately make them sad.
author: Ben Whishaw

quote: I find America falling in love with a TV show flattering and interesting, but at the same time a little sad.
author: David Schwimmer

quote: I think when I'm in love, I really am very good with calling, little faxes, and visiting and I really put a lot of effort into it. I'm really not the one that's not available because of work and I'm very sad when I actually leave.
author: Franka Potente

quote: I will be sad. I've gotten very attached to Harry and all that goes on in his world, I guess I'll just be kind of tasting every bit of it because it will be the last one.
author: Mary Grandpre

quote: I think it's a terrible thing to write and not enjoy it. It's a sad thing. But of course a lot of people do work because they need to eat. And we all need to eat, but that's not the only reason to work. You couldn't have paid me not to write.
author: Anne Perry

quote: I have a stepladder. It's a very nice stepladder but it's sad that I never knew my real ladder.
author: Craig Charles

quote: Country fans need to support country music by buying albums and concert tickets for traditional artists or the music will just fade away. And that would be really sad.
author: George Jones

quote: Everybody has a right to like or dislike anything or anyone. From a flower to a flavor to a book or a composition but it is very sad that in our country we actually fight over such things in an unseemly manner.
author: Ravi Shankar

quote: The hardest thing is at the end you have to say bye to all these people who you have worked with for so many months. It was really sad not to see them anymore. But you have the parties that you go to and you get to see them, like the premieres and the screenings.
author: Dakota Fanning

quote: I like everything perfect. Everything has to be neat. My sister is 5, and she's more messy than I am. I make my bed every morning, everything's perfect. My shoes are all arranged. It's sad. I'm a little like Ray, a little bit.
author: Dakota Fanning

quote: You listen to a piece of music and it will remind you of something - it might make you happy, it might make you sad, but it is very emotive. And I think that Duran Duran have always understood that.
author: Nick Rhodes

quote: Our hope, and it's a sad hope, is that... well, I mean we need a tip. That's why we have such a big reward. We just hope that someone is holding her for her child and that we can, you know, get her back with a tip.
author: Scott Peterson

quote: You want people to feel something when you tell a story, whether they feel happy or whether they feel sad.
author: Harry Dean Stanton

quote: I don't wanta do any Blues or any sad songs.
author: Bob Livingston

quote: Sad old blokes, I'm told, now dream of me with a whip in hand.
author: Anne Robinson

quote: Among the reasons people keep sad stories to themselves is that they do not want anyone to feel sorry for them. I don't. I don't want you to feel sorry for me.
author: Judith Moore

quote: It's sad that the most glorious of sexual experiences can make us feel guilty, ashamed, embarrassed, and abnormal.
author: Sue Johanson

quote: Here in the United States, our profession is much maligned, people simply don't trust or like journalists anymore and that's sad.
author: Christiane Amanpour

quote: You know, they just don't make big movie stars the way they used to, maybe because the system has changed, the studio system, but it's sad to see people like Jimmy Stewart go, all the giants of the past.
author: Tom Atkins

quote: I'm sad and blue, about nobody but you. I told you that I loved you right from the start, you told me the same and now you try to break my little heart.
author: Leon Redbone

quote: All you'd have to do is get a sad look, and he'd try to do something for you.
author: Margaret O'Brien

quote: In LA, I mean, here's this place full of desperate and sad people who take their only pleasure from destroying others for the purposes of their own self-aggrandizement.
author: Heather Donahue

quote: A lot of our entertainment throws into detail the stagnation and illness of how we live today-it's sad and it's sick... and it's profitable.
author: Heather Donahue

quote: The books are funny and sad, and that's what people respond to.
author: Paula Danziger

quote: Then, of course, there are those sad occasions when a poet or a writer has not grown, and one has to let them go because they're just not making headway. But we have a very clear personal relationship with the authors.
author: James Laughlin

quote: I have felt terribly from the beginning when I saw the problems and recognized that they would be ongoing. We were hired to put back the contours of the greens as closely as possible to George Thomas's designs and were real proud of what we did. It's a sad situation now.
author: Ben Crenshaw

quote: It's sad - it's sad for us old enough to remember when directors ruled, and films were substantially better than they are today. But it's hard to argue with those kinds of grosses.
author: Mark Rydell

quote: People say, oh it's a shame, you're not nostalgic about the '60s. Well actually, it's quite good, when you think of it. Wouldn't it be sad if I was sitting here wishing it back?
author: Robert Wyatt

quote: We all remember where we were and we all remember what we were doing. I had a brother in New York, an uncle, lots of friends in New York. It made me angry, it made me sad; what could I do.
author: Timothy Bottoms

quote: When I was in Philadelphia during the Depression in 1930 or '31, I got a very sad job as a night watchman in a garage. The cars in the garage had been abandoned by their owners, since they had lost their jobs and couldn't keep up the payments.
author: Tom Glazer

quote: I like 'Bewitched' off the first album because it's one of the happiest songs I've ever written and, as any writer will tell you, happy songs are a million times more difficult to write than sad songs.
author: Malcolm Wilson

quote: Someone once accused me of being like Eliot Ness. I sad no sir, I'm not E.N., but I can promise you that I'm not Al Capone!
author: Robert Stack

quote: I think the thing's that perhaps sad really is that younger people haven't come in and I think it must have been absolutely fantastic to have worked in the 50's when you had all of the great Broadway composers and when West Side Story didn't win the Tony Award.
author: Andrew Lloyd Webber

quote: I didn't know my mother had it. I think a lot of women don't know their mothers had it; that's the sad thing about depression. You know, you don't function anymore. You shut down. You feel like you are in a void.
author: Marie Osmond

quote: What I am sad about is that there is now, in America, no equivalent to the art circuit.
author: Richard Attenborough

quote: My father comes from a generation of film that actors my age don't even know about, which is really sad.
author: Amber Tamblyn

quote: Just because I'm talking about something that might have been a sad or painful situation doesn't mean that I'm sad or tortured 24 hours a day any more than anybody else is.
author: Lucinda Williams

quote: I love music and musicians. And seeing great artists dropped from labels was really frustrating and sad to me.
author: Rosanna Arquette

quote: All he cares about is going out there with his Jack Daniels bottle. Nothing has changed. That's kind of sad. If David was doing better than he used to be, then that would be different. But it was a joke and he made it that way.
author: Sammy Hagar

quote: It's astonishing what some women will put up with just to have a warm body. Some of the brightest women I know are just obsessed with that search. It's very sad.
author: Judith Rossner

quote: Elaine is just in pain. I think Elaine has become very, very sad woman. She is someone who is in deep need of many hours of analysis and I like to think that I'm not that type of person.
author: Julia Louis-Dreyfus

quote: I think I have a dark view of the world. I have to make everything funny, otherwise it all seems so sad.
author: Moon Unit Zappa

quote: I recently turned down a film that I didn't want my kids to see. Priorities shift. Sometimes I'm sad about that, but not enough to do anything about it.
author: Dianne Wiest

quote: With any group of people in life, sad things happen, and crazy things, and happy things. When you're in the public eye, it's just amplified, that's all.
author: Margot Kidder

quote: Well, I did Marlene 15 years ago and that's in the style. It's somehow similar and not similar because Marlene was much more aggressive, funny and sad.
author: Maximilian Schell

quote: Even when I begin with a situation that's basically funny or sad, I like to keep poking around in it. I like to get into the middle of a relationship, to explore the subtle places.
author: Paul Mazursky

quote: I had never felt so lonely and so sad in my entire life.
author: Susan Smith

quote: I have been to several wars to draw. I went to Vietnam. And made drawings in Vietnam during that period of the war there, and found that to be a very very sad situation.
author: Gerald Scarfe

quote: So war is an extremely sad business, because the majority of people don't want to be in it.
author: Gerald Scarfe

quote: I've grown as a person. The dynamics on this set are very demanding because we work a lot of hours, it's very sad material, so there's always someone upset because it's really heavy stuff.
author: Elisabeth Rohm

quote: With out art, without communicating, we wouldn't live beyond 30 because we'd be so sad and depressed.
author: Wayne Coyne

quote: I know for works for me - those wonderful sad love songs.
author: Toni Braxton

quote: The sad thing about any business I suppose, but in mine you see it particularly, is that you're always asked to do what you've already done.
author: Jeremy Irons

quote: But now Americans, they felt a sense of peace and protection because they've been separated by so many thousands of miles of ocean. And you know, the fact that it's come to the U.S. like this is so sad, and yet you know, what can you do? It's here.
author: Patty Hearst

quote: I'm sad to say that stardom is a commodity in our culture.
author: Christine Baranski

quote: There is the glamour side of it, which allows you to meet great variety of people with whom you simply can have a good time, but there's also the sad side of it that drags you into a superficial and artificial world.
author: Karolina Kurkova

quote: So far, at least, I haven't found a way to tell my kind of stories without making them both sad and funny.
author: Todd Solondz

quote: I love playing football, being out on the pitch with a ball, and I will be a little sad when that ends.
author: Dennis Bergkamp

quote: With the other fellow actors who have gone astray, I think it's sad that society wants to label the business as doing this to people. It's really not true.
author: Tina Yothers

quote: What happened was very sad. Mr. Lacey told the staff that he was disappointed and appalled that the front of the book was all commentary and that he wanted hard news.
author: Sydney Schanberg

quote: You see so many artists who are so talented end up living sad, empty lives. This industry takes so much out of you that without the accountability and leaving God in the center, you can be left so empty and void.
author: Stacie Orrico

quote: I've never had my heart broken. It's a very sad state of affairs. I think everybody should have their heart broken. I don't think it says anything good about me at all.
author: Sally Field

quote: The sad fact is that the same terrorist scenarios, if they occurred in five different States, there could be five different sets of responses to the American people. We need, at a minimum, a level of coordination on communicating threats to the public.
author: Vito Fossella

quote: It is sad that the Republican leadership is not as interested as they say they are in protecting the institution of marriage as they are in waging a campaign to divide and distract the American people from the real issues that need to be addressed.
author: Kendrick Meek

quote: I was so sad from losing two of my dogs and my mother. I had this vision of all these animals sitting behind bars. They had no control and were scared. That's why I got into fostering and adopting animals out.
author: Linda Blair

quote: If I get the forty additional years statisticians say are likely coming to me, I could fit in at least one, maybe two new lifetimes. Sad that only one of those lifetimes can include being the mother of young children.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: Christmas makes everything twice as sad.
author: Douglas Coupland

quote: What's sad is that there is an addictive quality to that, to believing your own hype; to allowing yourself to become validated by others and no longer by yourself. That's the danger of celebrity.
author: Giovanni Ribisi

quote: I'll always be sad that my marriage ended.
author: Shania Twain

quote: You had to be into sport and, sad to say, I'm a traitor to my country because I don't have a sporting bone in my body.
author: Geoffrey Rush

quote: I remember a time when all my fans were crying and sad and going through hell. Now, we're trying to uplift each other and accept ourselves for who we are, even if nobody else does.
author: Mary J. Blige

quote: It's sad that women characters have lost so much ground in popular movies. Didn't 'Thelma and Louise' prove that women want to see women doing things on film? Thelma and Louise were in a classic car; they were being chased by cops; they shot up a truck - and women loved it.
author: Robin Quivers

quote: My little son, Atticus, desperately needs his dad and I haven't been there for him... and that's sad.
author: Daniel Baldwin

quote: I'm incredibly sad that my mother's not here to see my kids and that my kids don't get to know her. And she didn't meet my husband. That's one of the hardest things. I don't even know how to put that into words.
author: Stella McCartney

quote: I think as an American society, when we're paying too many taxes or dealing with war, we don't want to see sad things at the movies.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: 'The Killing' has a really great combination of qualities: Even though it's very sad and deals with mourning and grief, it's still exciting. It's about real people and it doesn't shy from the painful points of life.
author: Joel Kinnaman

quote: We've got people looking at our seamy side and our sad side a lot of the time because that's easier. It's much more difficult to make a film about happiness with lots of jokes in it.
author: Emma Thompson

quote: I've had moments where I realize my body isn't going to withstand many more seasons, but I am very satisfied with my career and I am trying not to look at retirement as a sad thing.
author: Cat Osterman

quote: I think it's sad to me that I had to make a decision to not play the game that I feel like I'm best at and that I love. But if it was just about the game itself, I'd be there in a heartbeat. But that's not how the real world works.
author: Tiffeny Milbrett

quote: Ideally, I would love to mix singing and acting, but you can only be a pop star for so many years. I mean, at 30 it's a little bit sad, right?
author: Rachel Stevens

quote: I had a vocal coach. It's a sad thing, but I had to hire someone so that I could get my Australian accent back.
author: Anthony LaPaglia

quote: My childhood, I would say, was a bit sad.
author: Columba Bush

quote: My dad was a homicide cop in the gay neighborhood in the city when gay neighborhoods were desperate, depressing, sad places run by the mob. The only gay people he'd met when I came out to him were corpses.
author: Dan Savage

quote: I've never met a woman who thinks they've got a good enough figure - however perfect they look - which is sad, because no one else can see these perceived flaws; they're entirely internal.
author: L'Wren Scott

quote: 'Vegas' was something very close to me. I had such a blast doing that. I'm still a little upset that we never really got to shoot that final episode. So many people were invested in it. I'll always be sad about that.
author: Josh Duhamel

quote: I think a lot of people think that my parents' deaths is why I write such sad songs, but that's not true. Those songs may just be the woman I am.
author: Shelby Lynne

quote: Why do we capital-N Nerds love Mars so much? Because it's beautiful, it's tough, it's buried in our mythic, childhood memories. It's covered with human triumphs but also with sad stories of failure.
author: Greg Bear

quote: War is very sad and small life is pathetically fragile at times.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: I am co-writing a screenplay now and I'm working on the rights to another story I want to do. So I plan to produce and direct. So, for me, I don't really feel that I am vulnerable to that sad baggage that comes with the business of filmmaking.
author: Kerry Washington

quote: What's really sad is that so many young women between the ages of 16 and 25 are ignorant and they already believe that women get the same pay as men. They don't even really understand that equality hasn't happened with the pay force.
author: bell hooks

quote: I've got to be high class... Which is sad, because I like bars.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: I've traveled around the country and I read local newspapers and all of that, and it's a sad, sad thing to go from city to city and see the small newspapers and they're tiny. They're tiny not only in size but also in scope.
author: Jim Lehrer

quote: Home will always be Northern Ireland but my schedule means for the next few years I won't be there as much. I can't do the same things that I did a year ago. That is I'm something conscious of, but I'm not sad about it. It's fine.
author: Rory McIlroy
